name: elastic
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS elastic service is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/elastic/
	Issues: https://docs.mesosphere.com/support/
postUninstallNotes: DC/OS elastic service is being uninstalled.
preInstallNotes:
Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: CPU: 4.5 | Memory: 11264MB | Disk: 15500MB

More specifically, each instance type requires:

Master node: 3 instances | 1.0 CPU | 2048 MB MEM | 1 2000 MB Disk

Data node: 2 instances | 1.0 CPU | 4096 MB MEM | 1 10000 MB Disk

Ingest node: 1 instance | 0.5 CPU | 2048 MB MEM | 1 2000 MB Disk

Coordinator node: 1 instance | 1.0 CPU | 2048 MB MEM | 1 1000 MB Disk
